    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    BestScore
    Handles saving and loading the player's best score.
    BestScoreTest
     
    Board
    The main game board that defines how bricks move, rotate, merge, and how the score and rows are managed.
    Brick
     
    BrickGenerator
     
    BrickRotator
    Handles rotation for the current falling brick.
    BrickTest
     
    ClearRow
    Stores the result after checking and clearing full rows on the board.
    ClearRowTest
    The row-clearing function of the SimpleBoard class is tested using this test class.
    DownData
    This class just bundles two things together when the brick moves down the cleared row info (if got clear lah)
    EventSource
    Shows where an event comes from in the game.
    EventType
    Shows what type of move event the player makes.
    GameController
    The GameController connects the game logic (Board) with the GUI.
    GameInputProcessor
    This class handles all the keyboard pressing one.
    GameLoopTimer
    This class is the engine for the gravity.
    GameOverPanel
    Game over panel shown when the game ends.
    GameRenderer
    This is the Painter class.
    GameStatsDisplay
    This class is like the scoreboard manager.
    GuiController
    This class handles all the UI things for the Tetris game.
    InputEventListener
    This interface is used to handle all input events from the player,each method is called when the user make action.
    LevelTracker
    This small class helps us count the progress.
    Main
    This is the main entry to loads the Start Menu UI and starts the JavaFX window.
    MatrixOperations
    Utility class that handles matrix operations used by the Tetris board.
    MatrixOperationsTest
    The MatrixOperations class's row checking and score calculation functions are verified by this test class.
    MoveEvent
    This class basically keeps track of what kind of move the player or system is doing.
    NextShapeInfo
    This class just keeps track of the next rotated shape of a brick.Basically, when the player rotates, we check this shape first.
    NotificationPanel
    This panel is used to show the small bonus text when player clears lines which plus 50point.
    RandomBrickGenerator
     
    Score
    The Score class keeps track of the player's score during the game.
    ScoreTest
    This test class is used to check the Score class.
    SimpleBoard
    SimpleBoard is the main class that controls the game state.
    SimpleBoardTest
     
    SoundEffect
    Handles all game audio, including background music and sound effects like move, clear, and game over.
    StartMenuController
    Controller for the start menu screen.
    ViewData
    This class just keeps all the info needed to show the falling brick on screen lah.
